original_title: British Cinema: Personal View — A Turnip Head’s Guide To The British Cinema
overview: Documentary presenting Parker’s view of British cinema with comments from Richard Lester and others and location report from King’s Lynn on the making of Hugh Hudson’s Revolution, starring Al Pacino, Donald Sutherland, and Nastassja Kinski.
title: British Cinema: Personal View — A Turnip Head’s Guide To The British Cinema
